text:
Imagine building powerful generative
AI applications, with high-performing

models, grounded with your company's data
and integrated with any system.

All in a collaborative,
well-governed fashion, without heavy

infrastructure management
or complex coding.

Today, building and deploying generative
AI solutions can feel daunting.

Multiple tools, trial and error
processes, inefficient asset sharing,
and navigating responsible AI practices
often slow progress and limit innovation.
Introducing Amazon Bedrock in Sagemaker Unified Studio.

A governed environment that streamlines 
the generative AI development journey.

It brings everything under one roof,
offering intuitive access

to high performing foundation models
and empowering you to prototype,

customize, and securely
share AI application in your workspace.

Quickly test and iterate
with leading text, image,

and video foundation models
in a user friendly playground.

Tailored generative AI applications
like Agents and Flows

to automate non-deterministic
and structured workflows.

Enhance their outputs with knowledge bases
to ensure relevance.
Enforce responsible AI using guardrails.

Seamlessly integrate with external systems
through functions,

Fine-tune performance
and achieve your unique business

objectives within a framework
that promotes responsible AI practices.

Seamlessly work with colleagues
in a secure, access-controlled environment
that lets you collaborate confidently.
Accelerate innovation,

and build the generative AI applications
your business requires -

faster, smarter and fully governed
with Amazon Bedrock in Sagemaker Unified Studio
